# TableTurnr

> AI-powered operations command center for restaurant teams.

TableTurnr gives restaurant managers, shift leads, and staff a single platform to track sales, labor, inventory, and table turn-time in real time. It replaces fragmented spreadsheets and disconnected tools with one unified view, powered by AI forecasting and proactive alerts.

## Key Facts

- Product: Restaurant operations intelligence platform (Web, iOS, Android)
- Founded: 2025
- Website: https://tableturnr.com
- Demo: https://tableturnr.com/demo/

## What TableTurnr Does

- **Business 360 Dashboard**: Real-time sales, labor, COGS, and service metrics in one screen
- **Demand Forecasting**: AI-driven sales forecasts with 94%+ accuracy by daypart and location
- **Staffing Intelligence**: Demand-based scheduling that reduces overtime and improves coverage
- **Inventory Alerts**: Automated reorder triggers, waste tracking, and COGS anomaly detection
- **Turn-Time Optimization**: Table turn-time analytics to maximize throughput during peak hours
- **TurnrAgent**: AI assistant that provides proactive alerts, SOP answers, and shift-ready briefs
- **Role-Based Access**: Custom views for GMs, shift leads, kitchen staff, and regional directors

## Who It's For

- Restaurant general managers
- Franchise owners and operators
- Regional directors managing multi-unit operations
- Shift leads and front-of-house staff

## Results

- 15â€“25% more revenue per location
- 3+ hours saved daily per manager
- 5-in-1 tool consolidation (replaces separate POS analytics, labor tools, inventory systems, forecasting spreadsheets, and communication tools)
